void.string:
An implementation of the Purkinje Cell model from De Schutter, E. and Bower, J. M. (1994) Based on Arnd Roth el al's conversion of the original GENESIS code to NEURON
* Not yet complete!!!* Press Validate for details
Note: Sim configs with BothSims in title use only ChannelML based mechanisms and so can be used on NEURON and GENESIS.
This is the default configuration of the Cell Groups, stimulations, plots, etc for this project
